英文公告.機關名稱: The 9th River Bureau, Water Resources Agency, Ministry of Economic Affairs
英文公告.機關地址: No. 19, Jen-ai St., Hualien, Taiwan, R.O.C
英文公告.標案名稱: Advance Cross Section Survey Plan for the Shiew-Gu-Luang River
英文公告.廠商地址: 6F,NO.215.Sec 3 nanjing E Rd Taipea City 104 Taiwan
英文公告.附加說明: Summary on vendor qualifications: Vendor must be one of in the form of research institute, organization, legal entity, or company. 1.Venders in the form of institute, legal entity, or organization must register or establish at least one item related to hydraulic engineering, Survey engineering, or civil engineering, etc.2.Venders in the form of company must be qualified as Survey application of commercial registration license and establishment and local business membership certificate. For engineering consulting entities, venders not only include related documents of Survey proof, but also get the document of legitimate registration issued by Public Construction Commission, Executive Yuan, and local business membership certificate. 3.Foreign vendors required to set up business operation locations before executive of the project should provide registration proof issued by the government for subsidiaries, branches, or offices. A certified Chinese translation document must be provided for Origins document. Documents must be certified by Taiwan overseas representative office.4.Related documents of proof:(1)Proof of registration or establishment: qualified documents include company registration or commercial registration documents, legal entity or institute establishment registration documents, factory registration license, approved registration qualified documents, practice license, start-up proof, registration proof or document of legitimate registration or establishment of such vendor issued by government authorities or other licensing authorities.(qualified documents can be printed from website of Government )(2)Proof of tax payment: proof of business or income tax.-Proof of business tax: the receipt slip for tax payment of business tax or the latest installment of receipt slip for the establishment’s sale amount and tax declaration issued and endorsed by IRS. If the vendor is not able to provide the proof for the latest installment, the previous installment tax payment is acceptable. For start-up companies not due for the first tax payment, the official document of establishment registration issued by IRS and document for voucher purchase in application of standardized receipt will be accepted. -Proof of income tax: proof of tax payment for comprehensive taxation or receipt slip for tax declaration can be accepted. For other information, please refer to the application notification.
